Name: Hassan Usman
AboutMe:
Always looking for challenges; is how I like to describe myself, passionate towards technology.Currently pursuing Bs Computer Science and working as freelance Android and IOS developer. I have successfully converted a hobby to become my lifetime! career. I have been involved professionally in the Web development industry.

I am an experienced Android and IOS Developer on my journey to become the master of the craft. With commitment and dedication towards my trends of professionalism; I have been always managing projects and teams to reach the maximum performance with the maximum quality.

Specialties:

(1) Android / IOS Developer.

(2) Desktop Programming for Web Services (C# .Net , Java & C++)

(3) Web (Back-End Development)

(4) Web Usability and Accessibility

(5) Industry Skills: Internet / Web Analytics, IT/Consulting, Media/Entertainment, Education.

Apart from computer education, I have played Badminton and represented our club. Currently playing in Lahore Badminton Sports Club and recently won Punjab State Badminton tournament & became runner-up in District level sports fest.
